Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media voiced their concerns on various issues that affect their daily lives. @RyanWil62993886 opined for the protection of essential programs like 'Roads to Recovery' and 'Roads of Strategic Importance' while criticising budget cuts by Dan Andrews. Rising food energy and rent costs led people to make difficult choices especially for those who rely on #IncomeSupport. Various individuals emphasised on Labour Day Parade's significance in the progress of workers and unions grateful for the involvement of a Labour Prime Minister and Premier. Lastly the slumping economy led to calls for policies that promise to improve business investment in the future.
